name: Pin Pon
description:
Pin Pon is a game about online dating. Using a leap motion controller, players try to bounce stuff off their part of the table and into the opponents. Its always a match!

Read more here.

Pin Pon was first presented in UCLA Design | Media Arts program, Spring 2015. It was showcased in Northern Spark (2015) by UCLA Game Lab , at the Ghosting Vol.17 and at the exhibition How To Water.

featured in Creators Project, Kill Screen, Hopes & Fears

Created by Theo Triantafyllidis.
